=Installation Instructions=

Download sources from here: <br>
# wget http://labyrinth-explorer.googlecode.com/files/Labyrinth%20Explorer.zip <br>

Extract it in your directory: <br>
# unzip Labyrinth\ Explorer.zip <br>

Compile it: <br>
# cd ~/Labyrinth\ Explorer <br>
# make <br>

Start the game: <br>
# ./labyrinth3rd <br>

To import the project from SVN: <br>
# svn checkout http://labyrinth-explorer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ labyrinth-explorer-read-only
